in: "org.eclipse.debug.core".

run(LaunchConfigurationsDialog.java:1235)

Should process launch callbacks in an async exec

Darins, this seems to happen as a result of getting an exception during 
launching.  Do you remember how you caused this exception?

No exception.  The action is responding to launchRemoved callback and doing UI 
processing in a non-UI thread.
To reproduce: 
Set your preferences to removed terminated launches
Debug a program to termination.
Show the Console process menu
Launch another program.
*** Bug 33971 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
